title: Web Developer | Main Page
bio: Hello everybody! I have been engaged in web development for more than 2 years. I create websites with cross-browser compatibility, adaptability and responsiveness in mind. For quick solutions with the style of the site, I use the Tailwindcss framework (which is better than bootstrap). Go to the Projects tab to view my completed work.
question: What I offer
serviceDescription1: Web page layout in a short time (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
serviceDescription2: Web application development using React JS and Next JS
serviceDescription3: Node JS & MongoDB is on process
serviceDescription4: Developing web applications based on MERN stack
